channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DHS agents in Utah allegedly sold illicit "bath salt" drugs from evidence

item.title: GOP majority begins 119th Congress with lengthy list of priorities
item.description: With newfound control of both chambers of Congress, Republican leaders are touting a list of priorities that they aim to quickly address, like immigra...

item.title: Apple to pay $95m to settle Siri 'listening' lawsuit
item.description: The tech giant denies wrongdoing after being accused of eavesdropping on customers.

item.title: New Orleans inches toward normalcy while mourning victims of deadly New Year’s rampage
item.description: A mix of law enforcement, street performers and football fans is filling New Orleans’ blocks as the city inches back to normalcy.

item.title: A record number of migrants reached the Canary Islands by sea in 2024, Spain says
item.description: The number beats the previous record, set in 2023, as a recent report also points at a peak in the number of deaths recorded in the dangerous Atlantic...

item.title: Apple to pay $95 million to settle lawsuit accusing Siri of eavesdropping
item.description: Apple isn't acknowledging wrongdoing in the settlement, which still must be approved by a U.S. District judge. Lawyers in the case have proposed sched...

item.title: Venezuela offers reward for candidate's arrest
item.description: The reward has been put forward for information leading to the arrest of Edmundo González.

item.title: Bereaved whale spotted pushing another dead calf
item.description: A whale that famously pushed its calf's dead body for 17 days in 2018 appears to be grieving again.

item.title: Search underway for Australian surfer likely killed in shark attack
item.description: Authorities say there's "been no sign of" a local surfer seen being attacked by a shark off South Australia's coast.

item.title: Assessing the Damage at Lebanon's Historical Sites
item.description: Part of a Crusader castle collapsed. An 18th century minaret toppled. Church mosaics burned. Israeli airstrikes have damaged priceless antiquities acr...

item.title: A dawn stand-off, a human wall and a failed arrest: S Korea enters uncharted territory
item.description: Yoon Suk Yeol is being investigated for inciting an insurrection, yet police are unable to arrest him.

item.title: Meet the new senators being sworn in to Congress in 2025
item.description: The Senate is convening for the start of the 119th Congress on Friday, with a dozen new senators joining the upper chamber.

item.title: Biden to award Medal of Honor to Korean and Vietnam War veterans
item.description: The Medal of Honor, the United States' highest military decoration, is awarded to service members who display exceptional valor in combat.

item.title: 2 dead and several injured in Southern California plane crash

item.title: Two dead after plane hits factory roof near LA
item.description: Police say that 18 people were also injured during the incident in Fullerton, California.
